name: A Favor (muntey)
description:
A Favor is a 15-minute-long, first-person, narrative game experience. Explore the apartment as you complete the chores laid out by your friend. Examine the environments to learn more about your friend and his secret. Discover the truth on where and who your friend is and why these strange occurrences happen.

Credits:
  • Christian Munteanu @themuntey (Programmer, 2D Artist, Game Designer, Lead Designer) 
  • Moritz Aigner @monetenmomo (Environment Artist, Lighting Artist, Shader Guy) 
  • Philipp Pohler @chilly_fipsi (Audio Designer, Wwise Magician, Game Designer) 
  • Nico Niefergall @niff_n (Prop Artist, Prop Designer, Texture Artist)
